#sidebar HashCommandsSidebar

= HMGET _key_ _field1_ ... _fieldN_ (Redis >= 1.3.10) =
_Time complexity: O(N) (with N being the number of fields)_

 Retrieve the values associated to the specified _fields_.

 If some of the specified _fields_ do not exist, nil values are returned.
 Non existing keys are considered like empty hashes.

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Multi Bulk Reply] specifically a list of all the values associated with the specified fields, in the same order of the request.
